Nov. 25, 1979 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Youth Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Youth Section) 50 Own Choice Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-of-leicester-festival-youth-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40 and trophy, 2nd £30 and trophy, 3rd £20 and cup. 7 bands competed.
Feb. 2, 2013, 11:03 a.m. Feb. 4, 2017, 4:35 p.m.
1 Crewe Co-op Youth Unknown
2 Chalford Youth Ken Wear
3 Rhodian Brass David Windle
4 Jubilee Brass (Oxford) Ken Membury
Unknown Result Ratby Co-operative Youth Betty Anderson
